name: Allow Registration
description: Allows registration of new users

name: Allow Get Me
description: Allows users to retrieve their own profile information

name: Allow Update Details
description: Allows users to update their profile details

name: Allow Update Password
description: Allows users to update their password

name: Allow Logout
description: Allows users to log out

name: Allow Get All Paints
description: Allows retrieval of all paint colors

name: Allow Login
description: Allows users to log in

name: Allow Update Stock Assigned
description: Allows update of stock for assigned paint color

name: Allow Update Paint Color
description: Allows update of a paint color

name: Allow Delete Paint
description: Allows deletion of a paint color and associated stock

name: Allow Create Task
description: Allows creation of new tasks

name: Allow Get All Tasks
description: Allows retrieval of all tasks

name: Allow Get My Tasks
description: Allows retrieval of tasks assigned to the user

name: Allow Update Any Task
description: Allows update of any task

name: Allow Update My Task Status
description: Allows update of the status for assigned tasks

name: Allow Delete Task
description: Allows deletion of tasks

name: Allow Get All Users
description: Allows retrieval of all users

name: Allow Create User
description: Allows creation of new users

name: Allow Enable/Disable User
description: Allows enabling or disabling a user

name: Allow Delete User
description: Allows deletion of a user and their tasks

name: Allow Create Paint
description: Allows creation of new paint colors

name: Allow Update Stock All
description: Allows update of stock for any paint color

name: Allow User Management and Ability Management
description: Allows managing users and their abilities
